poem:
**Surrender**

Little child,  
in the kingdom of God,  
your soft hands embrace  
the gentle flow of time.  
Facing the tender flame,   
we learn surrender—  
an unspoken grace:  
fields of quiet,  
where you bloom  
eternal.
